Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Packages
  • Deprecated Interfaces
  • Deprecated Classes
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Constructors
  • Deprecated Packages 
    Package and Description
    com.github.crashdemons.playerheads.api.extensions
    Draft API - not implemented yet.
  • Deprecated Interfaces 
    Interface and Description
    com.github.crashdemons.playerheads.api.extensions.HeadExtension
    Draft API - not implemented yet.
    com.github.crashdemons.playerheads.api.extensions.HeadIdentifier
    draft api - not fully implemented
    com.github.crashdemons.playerheads.api.extensions.HeadUpdater
    draft api - not fully implemented
  • Deprecated Classes 
    Class and Description
    com.github.crashdemons.playerheads.api.extensions.CustomHead
    Draft API - partial implementation available only.
    org.shininet.bukkit.playerheads.events.FakeBlockBreakEvent
    you should use SimulatedBlockBreakEvent instead, this class may be removed in the future
    com.github.crashdemons.playerheads.api.extensions.HeadExtensionManager
    Draft API - not implemented yet.
    com.github.crashdemons.playerheads.api.extensions.SimpleHeadModule
    Draft API - not implemented yet.
    com.github.crashdemons.playerheads.api.extensions.SimpleHeadPlugin
    Draft API - not implemented yet.
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    org.shininet.bukkit.playerheads.events.HeadRollEvent.getChargedCreeperModifier()
    use getModifier("chargedcreeper") instead
    com.github.crashdemons.playerheads.api.PlayerHeadsAPI.getCompatibilityProvider()
    although this is provided and maintained, it is subject to change with plugin requirements, so you should avoid using it normally.
    org.shininet.bukkit.playerheads.events.BlockDropHeadEvent.getDrop()
    Multiple items may drop, this method only retrieves the first.
    org.shininet.bukkit.playerheads.events.DropHeadEvent.getDrop()
    multiple items may be dropped, use getDrops() instead.
    org.shininet.bukkit.playerheads.events.LivingEntityDropHeadEvent.getDrop()
    This method only gets one drop item, there may be multiple
    com.github.crashdemons.playerheads.api.PlayerHeadsAPI.getHeadIdentity(EntityType)
    this may not do exactly what you want because between MC 1.10-1.13 many entities were separated from variants to their own. Also, this foregoes any head ownership information beyond the that defined by the type of mob/head.
    org.shininet.bukkit.playerheads.events.HeadRollEvent.getLootingModifier()
    use getModifier("looting") instead
    com.github.crashdemons.playerheads.compatibility.CompatibilityProvider.getOwnerDirect(Skull)
    This method does not include extended checking, you probably dont want the direct method.
    com.github.crashdemons.playerheads.compatibility.CompatibilityProvider.getOwnerDirect(SkullMeta)
    This method does not include extended checking, you probably dont want the direct method.
    com.github.crashdemons.playerheads.compatibility.CompatibilityProvider.getOwningPlayerDirect(Skull)
    This method does not include extended checking, you probably dont want the direct method.
    com.github.crashdemons.playerheads.compatibility.CompatibilityProvider.getOwningPlayerDirect(SkullMeta)
    This method does not include extended checking, you probably dont want the direct method.
    org.shininet.bukkit.playerheads.events.HeadRollEvent.getSlimeModifier()
    use getModifier("slime") instead
    com.github.crashdemons.playerheads.api.PlayerHeads.setApiInstance(PlayerHeadsAPI)
    This method is intended only for internal PlayerHeads use.
    org.shininet.bukkit.playerheads.events.HeadRollEvent.setModifier(String, DropRateModifier)
    using this method to modify existing modifiers should be avoided - use setCustomModifier to note new ones.
    org.shininet.bukkit.playerheads.events.HeadRollEvent.setModifiers(Map<String, DropRateModifier>)
    using this method to modify existing modifiers should be avoided - use setCustomModifier to note new ones.
  • Deprecated Constructors 
    Constructor and Description
    com.github.crashdemons.playerheads.api.extensions.CustomHead(UUID, String, String, String, String, List<String>, String)
    custom heads should avoid using owner usernames whenever possible.
    org.shininet.bukkit.playerheads.events.HeadRollEvent(Entity, Entity, boolean, double, double, double, double, double, boolean)
    org.shininet.bukkit.playerheads.events.HeadRollEvent(Entity, Entity, boolean, double, double, double, double, double, double, boolean)
    org.shininet.bukkit.playerheads.events.HeadRollEvent(Entity, Entity, boolean, double, double, double, double, double, double, double, boolean)
